parameters.name: VbCut
parameters.description: True if all instances of the selected component are left uncut, false if only the selected component is left uncut

title: IDrSection.SetDontCutAllInstances
description: Sets whether all instances of the specified component are uncut in this section view or only in the specified component.
signature:
System.Boolean SetDontCutAllInstances( 
   Component
LpComp
,
   System.Boolean
VbCut
)

parameters.name: VbCut
parameters.description: True if all instances of the selected component are left uncut, false if only the selected component is left uncut
